definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Qi4 xiang4 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: His father works at the weather station.
Radar data gridding and cinrad mosaic has significance in meteorological service.
sentences.chinese: 雷达资料的网格化及拼图在气象业务中有重要的意义。

sentences.english: The National Weather Service had predicted that the river would crest to about 19 feet above flood stage.
sentences.chinese: 国家气象台曾预报红河将上涨到洪水位以上19英尺。

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省气象台昨天傍晚发布浙江沿海地区强台风紧急警报。

sentences.english: The summer rainstorm was also one of the meteorological disasters which reduce the production of large cherry.
sentences.chinese: 夏季暴雨也是影响大樱桃生产的气象灾害之一。

sentences.english: Yost was an engineer involved in the development of high-altitude weather balloons.
sentences.chinese: 约斯特是一名工程师参与制订高空气象气球。

sentences.english: It's rather hot today. Here's a towel for you to wipe your face.
sentences.chinese: 今天气象太暖了，给您一条毛巾揩抹汗。

sentences.english: Meteorologists advised the public to wear face masks to ward off dust.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家建议公众外出时戴口罩。

sentences.english: Hurricane forecasters expect this year's hurricane season to be busier than average.
sentences.chinese: 气象预报员预计今年的飓风季会比往常更加频繁。

sentences.english: The effect of city on meteorological elements (for example , temperature)are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 文章探讨了城市对气温等气象要素的影响规律。

sentences.english: Chapter 84 According to the weather report, the typhoon is coming tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 根据气象报告，明天将有台风。

sentences.english: A weather forecaster said it was not yet possible to predict what would happen on Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 有气象预报员称，目前尚无法预测圣诞当天的天气。

sentences.english: Lishui Weather preliminary to the file information, file management automation.
sentences.chinese: 初步达到丽水气象档案信息化，档案管理的自动化。

sentences.english: As a matter of meteorology, Mr Fugate has a point.
sentences.chinese: 从气象学角度看，富盖特先生有自己的观点。

sentences.english: The weather girl batted.900 last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期气象报告女播音员的正确率达90%。

sentences.english: Finally, meteorological problems for throwing transplanted rice were mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 最后，提出抛秧稻生长中应注意的气象问题。

definition: meteorological or astronomical phenomenon (e.g. rainbow or eclipse)
interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)
all rivers run into the sea/use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)
vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
the dark ages before civilization/limitless reaches/vague and confused
efficient government, people at peace (idiom); all is well with the state and the people
